name: PhaseDrive
description:
How To Play:

Use the Arrow Keys to move the ship.

Press the Spacebar to Fire.

Press the "P" key to Pause the game/open the options menu.

In PhaseDrive you command an agile spaceship and use it to blast through wave upon wave of relentless enemies that all want you dead. 

Can you survive?

Upcoming Features

Below are some of the features that we intend to deliver in future iterations of the game.

  • Animations for the player and the enemy ships.
  • More diverse sound effects.
  • Player pickups / upgrades.
  • More enemy ships.
  • PhaseDrive mechanic to help with combat!
